abstract: The earnings conference call at Goldman Sachs was dominated by President Obama’s proposal to separate riskier proprietary trading from commercial banking, with analysts listening to the president’s announcement while the call was still going on.
snippet: The earnings conference call at Goldman Sachs was dominated by President Obama’s proposal to separate riskier proprietary trading from commercial banking, with analysts listening to the president’s announcement while the call was still going on.

headline.main: Obama Bank Plan Overshadows Goldman Call
